BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 170200Z TO 240159Z NOV BY
   M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V NPS OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING 200 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-22.22S 040-06.10W, 22-27.37S 039-57.77W,
   22-30.85S 040-00.10W, 22-25.53S 040-08.47W.
   TWO MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 240259Z NOV 12.
